title: [SOLVED]820-2915-B graphic issue after GPU replacement
message:
Hi guys!

I have this motherboard and after Gpu replacement is showing pink color on the image. When i touch the board when is switch on, the color on the screen changes.

Please check out the video.

[url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=A35mzVFl1oE[/url]

title: [SOLVED]820-2915-B graphic issue after GPU replacement
message: Put some light pressure on Gmux. See if image changes ?

title: [SOLVED]820-2915-B graphic issue after GPU replacement
message: Press on U9600 and see if symptom changes. If yes clean the edge bonding REALLY well and give it a reflow. If that fails, have fun reballing it.

title: [SOLVED]820-2915-B graphic issue after GPU replacement
message: I did some pressing on U9600 that did not change anything. However, pressing on VRAM was giving me changes on the screen. I have reflowed VRAMs and now everything seems to work fine. I hope for a long time. Problem solved, for now...
